attributes.name: AiiDA
attributes.description: Automated Interactive Infrastructure and Database for Computational Science (AiiDA)

attributes.name: AFLOW
attributes.description: Automatic FLOW (AFLOW) database for computational materials science

attributes.name: Alexandria
attributes.description: A collection of databases from the group of Prof Miguel A. L. Marques at Ruhr University Bochum.

attributes.name: Crystallography Open Database
attributes.description: Open-access collection of crystal structures of organic, inorganic, metal-organic compounds and minerals, excluding biopolymers

attributes.name: CCP-NC Database
attributes.description: The Collaborative Computational Project for NMR Crystallography (CCP-NC) Database hosts calculated NMR parameters submitted by users in the magres format.

attributes.name: Computational materials repository (CMR)
attributes.description: CMR is a collection of materials repositories from different projects such as C2DB, QPOD and many more

attributes.name: Example provider
attributes.description: Provider used for examples, not to be assigned to a real database

attributes.name: The High-Throughput Toolkit
attributes.description: Prefix for implementation-specific identifiers used in the httk implementation at http://httk.org/

attributes.name: MatCloud
attributes.description: A high-throughput computing platform integrating data, simulation and supercomputing.

attributes.name: Materials Cloud
attributes.description: A platform for Open Science built for seamless sharing of resources in computational materials science

attributes.name: Materials Cloud Archive
attributes.description: Databases contributed by the community to the Materials Cloud Archive

attributes.name: The Materials Project
attributes.description: An open database of computed materials properties to accelerate materials discovery and design

attributes.name: Material-Property-Descriptor Database
attributes.description: Material-Property-Descriptor Database (MPDD) of atomic structures. Optimized for the high-throughput deployment of material featurizers and ML models. Maintained by Phases Research Lab (phaseslab.org) at The Pennsylvania State University

attributes.name: Materials Platform for Data Science
attributes.description: A highly curated Pauling File dataset based on ~0.5M publications and backing up Springer Materials, ICDD PDF, ASM APD, MedeA, Pearson Crystal Data, AtomWork Advanced, etc.

attributes.name: Material Properties Open Database (MPOD)
attributes.description: The Material Properties Open Database (MPOD) is a web-based, open access repository of quantitative information about the physical properties of crystalline materials. MPOD is oriented to design engineers, scientists, science teachers and students. Properties are generally treated as tensor magnitudes. In MPOD the compact matrix notation is applied. To bring an intuitive view of tensor properties, so-called longitudinal properties surfaces are displayed. 3D printing of properties surfaces is implemented via creation of stl files. A dictionary of properties definitions is included. Eventually, comments are added. Syntax and notation in MPOD files is oriented towards matching IUCr standards and so tries to comply with CIF format.

attributes.name: optimake
attributes.description: A tool for turning static data into OPTIMADE APIs

attributes.name: novel materials discovery (NOMAD)
attributes.description: A FAIR data sharing platform for materials science data

attributes.name: open database of xtals
attributes.description: A public database of crystal structures mostly derived from ab initio structure prediction from the group of Dr Andrew Morris at the University of Birmingham https://ajm143.github.io

attributes.name: Open Materials Database
attributes.description: The Open Materials Database (omdb) is a database of materials properties maintained by the developers of the High-Throughput Toolkit (httk). It enables easy access to useful materials data, in particular via programmatic interaction using this toolkit.

attributes.name: OPTIMADE implementations and libraries
attributes.description: Prefix for implementation-specific identifiers used in API implementations and libraries provided at https://github.com/Materials-Consortia

attributes.name: The Open Quantum Materials Database (OQMD)
attributes.description: The OQMD is a database of DFT calculated thermodynamic and structural properties of materials

attributes.name: Joint Automated Repository for Various Integrated Simulations (JARVIS)
attributes.description: JARVIS is a repository designed to automate materials discovery using classical force-field, density functional theory, machine learning calculations and experiments.

attributes.name: Theoretical Crystallography Open Database
attributes.description: Open-access collection of theoretically calculated or refined crystal structures of organic, inorganic, metal-organic compounds and minerals, excluding biopolymers

attributes.name: 2DMatpedia
attributes.description: 2DMatpedia, an open computational database of two-dimensional materials from top-down and bottom-up approaches
